page.title: 15CONVENT LIFE 2 ,BOLTON
page.content:
The clothes that the nuns wear vary all over the world.The nuns at our school usually wear a black skirt, jumper and veil and a white blouse. It is up to them if they wear a white band on their veil.In some parts of the world the veil is not worn and the colours are not just black and white. The nuns enjoy life because they work in the service of Christ and his children; also they are part of a big family which is spread throughout the world. In their spare time the sisters knit,visit friends,walk and have other hobbies. The sisters know that the convent will change in the future
NOREEN MC CONIGLEY & CATHERINE HURST
